full_summary:
**Title (French and English)**: E6MON-230007 - RMSO - PERIOD 3 - Wood and Construction Materials
**Reference Number**: WS3851353187-Doc4266654214
**Publication Date**: 19 October 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: 14 November 2023 - 14:00 (EST)

**Description**: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites bids for a standing offer to supply wood and various construction materials to federal departments and organizations located in Quebec. The materials will be required for short notice delivery to various locations within the Montreal and Quebec metropolitan areas. 

**Scope of Work**: PWGSC seeks proposals for the supply of wood and various construction materials, as specified in Annex A of the tender. Respondents must demonstrate their ability to meet the needs of PWGSC for the following UNSPSC codes: 
* 30000000 - Structures and Building and Construction and Manufacturing Components and Supplies
* 30110000 - Concrete and cement and plaster
* 30130000 - Structural building products
* 30170000 - Doors and windows and glass
* 30260000 - Structural materials 

**Eligibility**: The response must adhere to the requirements outlined in the Government Contracts Regulations. Potential respondents are encouraged to review the full document for further details on the eligibility criteria, the terms and conditions, and the evaluation criteria.

**Important Dates**:
* Tender Closing Date: 14 November 2023 - 14:00 (EST)
* Adjustments to the Offer: All adjustments must be made 30 days before the closing date of the tender.
* Notification of Secondary Contracting Authority: In the event that a successful bidder does not meet the requirements as specified in Annex A, PWGSC reserves the right to select another contractor.

**Contact Information and Tender Sourcing**: The RFSO package is available for download through [official website](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17767880?extsite=MTc3Njc4ODBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==). Interested suppliers should review the following information contained within the tender package: 
* Capacity check mekt our Jul Juli template 
* Subcontracting control-meter advocates allowed
* Enthus jump coinc Choices preferred tests 

**Deadline**: All questions must be made no fewer than 5 business days prior to the closing date of the tender. 
No late questions will be accepted. All legal
